lines.text:
[reading off the signs]
"Hubba Hubba, one mile. Kuka Munga, one mile." Hm, well, I'll flip to see which way I go. Heads I go this way. Tails I go that way.
[jumps up and lands with his tail in the air]
Heh! Tails! I go that way.
Very becoming, short stuff. Gives you that new look.

[to the audience]
Keep your eye on the bull's eye!

[jabs Bugs in the butt]
Hey what's the big idea?, give me that dart!
[takes the spear from him and breaks the head]
there now don't let me hear about you playing with matches either!
